title: Sinful Desires
description:
This fairytale romance will leave you panting and you won't be able to catch your breath until the very last page. The heat between Ciara and Nikolaj intensifies in The Seduction Factor Book 5--Sinful Desires.The fifth book in the series takes place in five different cities and promises a number of saucy surprises!As Ciara and Nikolaj handle unexpected dramatic curveballs, we find out how love can make people do the craziest things!Scarlett Avery delivers an epic follow-up to an already illegally hot love story between Ciara and Nikolaj.
"OMG! Emotional Roller Coaster! OMG!!! An Emotional Roller Coaster. This book gives you love, anger, forgiveness all wrapped into one" --Tracey Brown
414 5-Star & 4-Star Reviews for entire series***Part 5 of this saucy alpha billionaire romance series by Bestselling Author Scarlett Avery's is a must-read seductive roller coaster. ***The Seduction Factor is a series of 6 books. The entire series has a HEA ending.
author: Scarlett Avery
